duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop test cases and automated QA testing scripts to thoroughly test applications as part of a CI/CD pipeline.
Log defects discovered into defect repository and report test findings to IT Project Managers and/or Application Developers for corrective action.
Design and maintain system processes, procedures, and support documentation based on lessons learned and continuous improvement.
Perform analysis for system improvements and assist in system test design, system testing, and support of the user during transition stages.
Proactively work with Application Developers to understand system logic and identify reasons for script failure.
Keep abreast of emerging technology and trends in automated test development and provide recommendations to management.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field (Master's preferred)
